user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I don't think this is at all like Glossier' cloud paint. The tube is much nicer, and it comes with an applicator that allows you to not only apply this as a blush, but also a lip color if you so wish. I have pigmented lips and it is quite difficult for me to find a multi-use products for both lips and cheeks that enhances both. When you first apply this product you have some time to blend it out or work it into your lips, and then it sets but does not dry you out. It lasts on my cheeks for about 4-6 hours, but reapplying it is very easy. I am able to blend it out over a light application of powder later on in the day if I need to. Most sephora locations do not carry this product, and I was actually surprised that 'waking up' was my perfect shade b/c I had originally gone in for "stutter." I have also used the Ilia blush sticks before, but I think this one lasts longer, and it is even more beautiful.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content:
If you're looking for a cloud paint alternative that is a little more matte than this is it! The texture is a little smoother and dries almost immediately once blended. I layer this on top of the Kosas tinted face oil and don't find that it moves or fades more than my other powder blushes. this color in particular is quite pigmented, i find i need to be careful on the cheeks or i end up with too much pigment. But its nothing a beauty blender can't help blend out. I find that on the lips is where i need to build the most, I apply a layer, let it dry and then apply another layer to strengthen the color. This is super nice with a lip liner underneath, I use MUFE 5C with a lip gloss on top of everything. I also use this product as an eyeshadow base, not sure if we're supposed to but i do anyway. Its really pretty in the crease with a shimmery gold on top. I have even used this to spot fix my fake tan in a pinch. This product isnt really for heavy makeup wearers as i dont think you would get the intensity that youre looking for but if you like cream products, multi use products or a no-makeup makeup look then this will be a delight for you. plus its clean at sephora! I really hope they bring out more colors as this color and the darker pinky red are the only ones i would put on deeper skin tones and i dont know if their would be a cast or not. Hopefully they can bring out some deeper colors!! would love a deep red brown and a true plum.

review_content: This product is very pigmented as blusher, so a little goes a long way. It stays on full 8 hours before fading. user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
Pricy af but it's amazing. I used this as eyeshadow, blush and as a lippie. I have a FULL, in depth review where I talk about how I used it and how it wore for each category on my blog called Lina Reviews. As a blush this was awesome, it doesn't patch, it doesn't disturb the rest of my makeup and it stays on up to 12-hours. As a lippie the colour is great, starts off very glossy and takes about 30 minutes to dry down. As an eyeshadow it creases pretty fast but if you set it with another shadow or a clear powder it stays on for much longer. There's a very small scent-- kinda like vanilla and musk but it's VERY minimal, don't let that deter you. Zero flavour. It isn't transfer resistant but I'm fine with that. This has very clean ingredients, it's vegan, cruelty free and most of all, works great as a multi-purpose pigment. It's pricy in my opinion but it's amazing. Highly recommend if it's in your budget. #LinaReviews

review_content:
I like Waking Up on my skin for a subtle makeup look. It has no noticeable taste but it smells like vanilla. On cheeks, I tap and blend and it sheers out to a pretty watercolor blush that lasts for most of the day. I can build it up in intensity after letting each layer dry. The product looks sticky with a slightly thick consistency at first but it’s easy to apply and dries down to a slightly tacky but soft matte finish. It doesn't lift my tinted foundation. review_content:
Ilia has surprised me in a good way! I usually don’t like the look of cream blush—powders just blend out more subtlely. Looks more natural...Until one day you turn 55 and realize your skin will not let you wear that charming powder blush. Your skin’s too dry and sensitive, and is more reactive as you age. This happened to me, so I ordered two colors: Before Today and Waking Up. ILIA’s new products have simply beautiful shades and rich pigmentation if you choose to max out the color. For me, a tiny tiny trace takes care of my whole face. On the apples of my cheeks, forehead or bridge of nose and cheeks, or to help lightly contour. These colors are brilliant, they fo cheeks AND lips, and it just wears exquisitely on young and old alike. But it’s like a 3-week vacation for us somewhat older ladies, because we have a lot drier, more wrinkled skin. I always hated liquid or creme blush, but ILIA’s changed all that for me. I look forward to full-makeup days so I can enjoy my nice glow! I had to leave off a star, though, because the product is sort of portrayed as being in a reasonably sized tube. At this price I don’t expect or appreciate a tube of blush/lip pigment being the size of my pinkie finger. It was represented as much larger in ads and marketing. Caveat emptor, I guess. Look before you buy. But another great thing about this double-duty pigment. It can save you money on buying two different products—with ILIA’s pigment you kill two birds with one, and you look great. A small amount lasts a while, so it justifies the price, for me.
…read more

review_title: Pretty much like Cloud Paint from Glossier
review_content: I have Cloud Paint from Glossier and this one. The texture almost the same but ILIA have better color for nude-pink choice. So If you like Cloud Paint, You probably like this one too. Just for ref, I'm Asian with medium /warm undertone and Waking up is perfect for a beautiful "no make up" looks.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Beautiful product. I love the creamy gel like formula. It blends really really nicely. The wear time is what I would expect of a cream based product and it wears well alone or with a powder on top. I am very happy with the packaging - so many cream products are exposed and I feel like they can get dirty quickly.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I bought temptation during the sale, went back and bought sing. I am absolutely in love with this product. It blends super easily over my foundation or BB or cc cream I’m wearing that day and I absolutely love the flush color it gives you!!! it looks great on your lips too and this is my absolute new favorite cheek stain and overall flush color dual product!!!

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: The color matched my skin tone perfectly. I have porcelain skin with cool undertones for reference. it glides on smooth and a little goes a long way. I have very sensitive skin and had no breakouts or reactions to this product! very lightweight and definitely a summer staple.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I really like how this feels on my lips, seems like it would be very moisturizing. However, most of these colors are way too light for us brown people. Need more colors!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
There is a reason why this product keeps on being sold out online. Luckily I found it at a Sephora store close by. I got the color Stutter. On my fair colored skin, a little of this product really goes a long way. It gives me that healthy glow on the cheeks. The application is really smooth and super easy to blend on cheeks and lips. On the lips it’s not drying at all which is nice. It almost feels like a smooth balm but not sticky.

So I only tried this on my lips as I already have many cream blushes. First of all it looks matte and soft, but is also somehow sticky so I’m not sure how it would work out on the cheeks on top of foundation. It is drying but applying chapstick before should fix it. Also the color comes off as more of a pale mauve/pink on me (light skin w/ yellow undertone) and not as bright as the pictures online show. Lastly, it is somewhat buildable and barely transfers. I would buy the other colors just because I’m obsessed with a soft blotted look and the color options for summer!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Beautiful formula and finish! It’s not drying at all. I have been searching for a matte cream blush and this is it! Waking Up looks so natural and perfect for my light-medium skin tone. I also bought the shade Temptation and it’s also gorgeous. The formula stays on all day and doesn’t cling to dry patches.

user_specs: ['Age over 54', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This stuff melts right into your skin for a very natural, shine-free glow. I don't like it on the lips, as it's a bit drying and very matte. Great cheek pigment though, and it's very easy to apply and build up. You can't get it wrong!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Deep', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I bought the color Stutter. This is the very best for cream cheek color and is actually great on lips. Most products that are multipurpose are too drying to use on lips but not this. Color is perfect for dark skin tones. Very pigmented two little drops will do blush and lips. Similar to Glossier but with more pigment.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: This product is great if you don’t have a problem finding lip products that are super moisturizing. Before Today is beautiful. Sing was a little brighter than I thought (I usually wear berry or mauve). I sadly could not purchase this because it dried out my lips.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Beautiful sheer color. I was surprised at the staying power as it lasted all day. Super moisturizing for your lips and incredibly natural on your cheeks. I’ll definitely be buying more.

user_specs: ['Age 18-24', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I purchased Stutter and before today. Good lord these are beautiful. I wore stutter on my lips, cheeks and eyes yesterday and recieved so many compliments. The formula is lightweight, easy to blend, and lasted all day. I'll be returning to get some more colors soon!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
There's a reason this product is selling out--it's amazing. I bought Waking Up, which is slightly more brown IRL than it looks on my monitor (and the package color is misleading and is much darker than the product for this color imo). It's the color and formulation I've been looking for all my life--the most natural blush color I've ever worn. The formulation is buildable, blendable, and very forgiving in spite of being very pigmented. This will be my daily driver for sure. All of my other blushes just met the bin at the back of the cabinet under the sink.

review_title: Too sheer, doesn't last, too expensive
review_content: Beautiful color, and the formula blended out well, even over long-wearing foundation. BUT, it was super sheer, didn't build, and faded drastically in the first 3 hours of wear. Slide right off my face. Save your money.

user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I tried this in store and I am so happy I did. These are beatiful and blend like a dream. They have a matte finish and can be quickly shared out or mixed with each other. I ended up with the burnt orange and warm nude. They look and feel great on the cheeks and the lips. I may pick up a berry tone. This is a two in one product so definitely worth it.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: Very pretty. It’s the perfect amount of dew. I would not really say it’s matte but it does dry down nicely and does not feel sticky at all. It smells incredible! By far my fave item from ilia. I feel as the integrity of the product will be much better since it is in a tube rather than a stick or pot like many cream blushes.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
This multi-use product makes me remind of glossier's paint cloud. However, I found this one is slightly more matte than glossier, but still give you an soft glow since its a cream product. Personally, I like the glossier one but cannot see it as a multi-use product, since it looks a bit patchy on lips. (dont get me wrong cause I had three of them and love it!) But Ilia make the purpose, although its on a much pricer side, the velvety silk finishing on cheeks and lips is stunning and comfy. It really does what it calm for, and for upcoming summer, its one of the top choice, love it : )

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content:
I love multi use products and this is the most amazing one I’ve ever used. The color is rich but can be applied lightly for a natural look. The texture is so smooth and creamy that application is easy and hard to mess up. A little goes a long way so use just a tiny amount until you are used to it. I bought Temptation after much deliberation because all of the colors are beautiful and pretty universal across skin tones. I’m definitely buying a couple more now that I know how amazing they are. The price is a little high but it’s worth it and one tube will last a long time.
